question: Which of the following is an initiative by the Department of Science and Technology to encourage more girls and women to take up careers in the domain of science and engineering?
explanation: “Vigyan Jyoti” is a programme launched by the Department of Science & Technology that aims to attract girl child or students to have a career in science & technology. Under this programme, the brightest girl students studying in classes IX, X and XI will get a chance to rub shoulders with top woman scientists of India and also decided IITs and IISERs would be the nodal centres and function as “Vigyan Jyoti Knowledge Centres”.
